definition: an outrageous, improper, vicious, or immoral act
examples: other enormities too juvenile to mention

definition: the quality or state of being immoderate, monstrous, or outrageous, great wickedness
examples: the enormity of the crimes committed during the Third Reich

definition: the quality or state of being huge : immensity
examples: the inconceivable enormity of the universe

definition: a quality of momentous importance or impact
